name: authenticator-extension
description: Authenticator generates 2-Step Verification codes in your browser.

scripts.copyChrome: cp -r src build css images js _locales LICENSE view chrome
scripts.copyFirefox: cp -r src build css images js _locales LICENSE view firefox
scripts.copyEdge: cp -r src build css images js _locales LICENSE view edge-files edge/Extension && mv edge/Extension/edge-files/AppXManifest.xml edge && mv edge/Extension/edge-files/icon*.png edge/Assets
scripts.packageEdge: cmd /C ""C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\App Certification Kit\makeappx.exe" pack /h SHA256 /d edge /p edge/Authenticator.appx"
scripts.installEdge: rm -rf edge && npm run edge && powershell -Command "Add-AppxPackage -Path edge\AppxManifest.xml -Register"
scripts.chrome: node ensureDir.js chrome && npm run compile && npm run copyChrome && cp manifest-chrome.json chrome/manifest.json
scripts.firefox: node ensureDir.js firefox && npm run compile && npm run copyFirefox && cp manifest-firefox.json firefox/manifest.json
scripts.edge: node ensureDir.js edge && node ensureDir.js edge/Extension && node ensureDir.js edge/Assets && npm run compile && npm run copyEdge && cp manifest-edge.json edge/Extension/manifest.json

author: Authenticator Extension
